text: Chayime bhikkhave phassakāyā cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghānasamphasso jivhāsamphasso kāyasamphasso manosamphasso
edit: Chayime bhikkhave phassakāyā – cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghānasamphasso jivhāsamphasso kāyasamphasso manosamphasso

translations.transtext: Monks, [they are] these six groups of contact: contact of eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, [and] mind.
